alert.note: Alert for Nelson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 8:02PM EDT until July 03 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Nelson County in central Virginia... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 802 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clifford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Shipman, Schuyler, Arrington, Lovingston, Bryant, Tye River, Allens Creek, Roseland, Rockfish, Tyro, Buffalo Springs, Norwood, Five Forks, Jonesboro, Gladstone, Wingina, Elma, Faber and Massies Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
